titles.title: Honoring the 50th Anniversary of the National Park Service Volunteers-In-Parks program that was established on July 29, 1970.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This resolution honors the 50th anniversary of the National Park Service Volunteers-In-Parks program.
